== Bontu-Mintur Adda ==
(বন্টু-মিন্টুর আড্ডা in <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bengali_language|Bangla]]</nowiki>)

==== What is it? ====
Bontu-Mintur Adda is the annual get together program of the Fan's of Ubuntu and Linux Mint in Bangladesh. So far it is the largest get together of Linux Fan's in the Country. 

==== Who organize it? ====
<nowiki>[[BangladeshiTeam|Ubuntu Bangladesh]]</nowiki> and Linux Mint Bangladesh jointly organize this event under the supervision of Bangladesh Linux Users' Alliance. 

==== Where it take place? ====
It take place in Dhaka, the capital city of Bangladesh.

==== How often it take place? ====
It's an annually event of <nowiki>[[BangladeshiTeam|Ubuntu Bangladesh]]</nowiki>.
